resources.string: One the toggle and enjoy a demo lock screen vibes!
Go to settings and allow necessary settings otherwise can not enjoy the feature.
To show the fake lock screen effectively, allow "Display Over Other Apps" so it can appear above all running applications.
To receive important updates, please allow notification access. This helps us keep you informed with alerts, tips, and relevant messages.

For the mentioned devices, please whitelist the app from battery optimizations to ensure a better experience. Otherwise, the status bar may not hide properly, and the floating icon or fake lock screen could be disabled.
